@Deprecated public abstract class UserWrapperConnection<TColumn extends UserColumn,TTable extends UserTable<TColumn>,TRow extends UserRow<TColumn,TTable>,TResult extends UserCursor<TColumn,TTable,TRow>> extends UserConnection<TColumn,TTable,TRow,TResult>
Deprecated.
use UserDao to query user tables
GeoPackage Connection used to define common functionality within different connection types. Wraps Cursor results.
